emergencyWithdraw(address,uint256).details: Emergency function to withdraw stuck tokens (only owner)

returns.wINRAmount: Amount of wINR that would be received

getConversionRate(address).details: Get conversion rate for a token

getRemainingDailyLimit(address,address).details: Get remaining daily conversion limit for a user

isAuthorizedToken(address).details: Check if a token is authorized for conversion

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setDailyConversionLimit(address,address,.details: Set daily conversion limit for a user and token (only owner)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateAuthorizedToken(address,bool).details: Authorize or deauthorize token for conversion (only owner)

params.status: True to authorize, false to deauthorize

updateConversionRate(address,uint256).details: Update conversion rate for a token (only owner)

params.rate: Conversion rate (token per wINR, scaled by 1e18)

updateMaximumConversionAmount(address,ui.details: Update maximum conversion amount for a token (only owner)

updateMinimumConversionAmount(address,ui.details: Update minimum conversion amount for a token (only owner)
